title: stealth technique
extract: Stealth technology also termed low observable technology (LO technology) is a sub-discipline of military tactics and passive and also active electronic countermeasures, which cover a range of techniques used with personnel, aircraft, ships, submarines, missiles, satellites and ground vehicles to make them less visible ...
extract_html: Stealth technology also termed low observable technology (LO technology) is a sub-discipline of military tactics and passive and also active electronic countermeasures, which cover a range of techniques used with personnel, aircraft, ships, submarines, missiles, satellites and ground vehicles to make them less visible ...
